points.title: The posting of pornographic content is prohibited
Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent merely from your usage.
Collecting objectionable content (even if generated by others) isn't allowed.
points.status:
"[you agree not to use Services] to collect, upload, transmit, display, or distribute any content:

    that violates any third-party right, including any copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret, moral right, privacy right, right of publicity, or any other intellectual property or proprietary right; or
    that is unlawful, harassing, abusive, tortious, threatening, harmful, invasive of another’s privacy, vulgar, defamatory, false, intentionally misleading, trade libelous, pornographic, obscene, patently offensive, promotes racism, bigotry, hatred, or physical harm of any kind against any group or individual or is otherwise objectionable;"
Note that you can't even collect content that is false. What about for the purposes of refuting it?
You also can't collect defamatory content, for instance in preparation for a defamation lawsuit.
This makes Anytype useless for any serious note-taking purposes.
